LanguageData.SadjuukTemperatureAA.label: Electric Heater
LanguageData.SadjuukTemperatureAA.description: Power : 175W T/s : 21 Electric Heater, has a low energy efficiency.
LanguageData.SadjuukTemperatureAB.label: Ceramic Heater
LanguageData.SadjuukTemperatureAB.description: Power : 100W T/s : +30 A Ceramic Heater, has a good energy efficiency.
LanguageData.SadjuukTemperatureBA.label: Steel Air Cooler
LanguageData.SadjuukTemperatureBA.description: Power : 200W T/s : -21 An electric Air Cooler. Have to be placed on a wall.
LanguageData.SadjuukTemperatureBB.label: Ceramic Air Cooler
LanguageData.SadjuukTemperatureBB.description: Power : 400W Beauty : 2 T/s : -63 A ceramic Air Cooler with good performance. Have to be placed on a wall.
LanguageData.SadjuukTemperatureCA.label: Electric Fan
LanguageData.SadjuukTemperatureCA.description: Power : 40W T/s : -8 T min : 24°C A cheap Electric Fan, reducing a little excess temperature in a room.
LanguageData.SadjuukTemperatureDA.label: Steel Ventilation
LanguageData.SadjuukTemperatureDA.description: A very simple ventilation, giving breathable air and transmitting heat between rooms. Have to be placed on a wall.
LanguageData.SadjuukVentAC.label: Cozy Ventilation
LanguageData.SadjuukVentAC.description: Beauty : 2 A filter ventilation of very good quality. Greatly increasing the comfort of the room. Have to be placed on a wall.
